entry.title: A Necassary Update
entry.summary: Before I address anything else - the webring. As I'm writing this right now, (although by the time this post is released, this shouldn't be an issue) there are 6 people waiting to be added to my webring. Some for nearly 20 days now - and I haven't done anything because I'm lazy. For this reason, and knowing that I can't force myself to be responsible in this aspect, I'm no longer accepting new members....
